title: Your weekend stars
text:
See what the weekend stars have in store for you.

WEEKEND OCTOBER 5-6, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 **

You’re in the mood to make changes. But are others ready for your ambitious Aries ideas? Don’t rush Rams! Consultation and attention to detail will get you a lot further than being slapdash.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

You can be incredibly fixed in your opinions and attitudes, which can put others offside. As the weekend progresses, try to get the balance right between being firm and being flexible.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

If you are disciplined and motivated this weekend, then you’ll power through the to-do list. And you’ll still have plenty of time to help someone who requires your practical assistance.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

You’re keen to move forward but make sure you’ve done all the reality checks – especially involving relationships. And do your best to balance the budget before you start splashing cash around.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Uranus urges you to move in an exciting new direction. So your motto is from birthday great, actress Kate Winslet. “The good and bad things are what form us as people. Change makes us grow.”

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

If you’re having money problems then think of creative ways to boost income and increase cash flow. When it comes to making a decision about a personal matter, resist the urge to rush.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

You can be dazzled by outer beauty but don’t be deceived by glossy outward appearances this weekend. Look beneath the surface to evaluate a person or property’s true lasting value.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

The planets encourage you to make lasting emotional connections within your local area. Friends, neighbours and/or family members will help you to feel an important part of your community.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

If you have a personal problem that needs solving, don’t look for a superficial quick fix. Instead, go deep into the issue to find a satisfactory solution, and realise that you can’t please everyone.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

Avoid being too business-like with others, as it may upset them. Instead, try to balance being professional with the personal touch. Listening closely to what others are really saying is the key.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

There’s so much to accomplish this weekend so get to it Aquarius! If things have been tense and terse with a loved one, now’s the time to make some serious concessions. Plus be extra patient.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 **

Keep it real Pisces! If you blur the boundaries between fact and fiction, then it will be a long and confusing weekend. The Capricorn Moon urges you to keep your feet firmly planted on the ground.

YOUR DAY

Strive to be more self-contained, as the Capricorn Moon stymies shows of affection.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a very sociable soul. December and January are the best months for romance, love, parties, proposals and weddings.

SUNDAY

YOUR DAY

The Moon pairs up with Pluto, so expect some intense emotional encounters today.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a fun-loving and optimistic person. 2020 is the year to be more domestically organised and settled.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the weekend stars have in store for you.
